title: "What is the Magical Conception and how does it relate to sexual alchemy?"
first_phrase: In this final part of the text, the author delves deeper into the symbolism behind the killing of Solfo and his female counterpart by Fineo's spear. This act represents a crucial point in the alchemic operation, where the inversion of energies occurs at the peak of sexual ecstasy. The author then challenges the reader to discover the secret of the regime of Fire and experiment with it, emphasizing the importance of total dedication and amalgamation of complementary forces in both body and soul. The right timing and approach to produce the desired effect also vary, ranging from inhibiting ejaculation, to internalizing the act, or going through both methods simultaneously. However, it is essential to note that the transformation must occur organically, not as an external intervention, to achieve the desired outcome.

last_phrase: In order to achieve the magical conception or birth, it is crucial to seize the moment when all the conditions for effective generation are present: radical dedication, total amalgamation of complementary forces in body and soul, and reaching the high wave of ecstatic unity. The procedure must occur organically, not as an external intervention. Remember, this is the moment when the male principle dominates, the female force transforms and nourishes the life principle, and the cycle of life renews itself.
